divs: Sighting DetailsI was driving on Rte. 72 in New Britain, CT. It was roughly 5pm and the sun had yet to set. It was probably the spring of 2000, but I don't remember the exact date and unfortunately did not document this event at the time. From a distance as I was driving, I saw a large, dark object motionless in the sky. Within a minute I was about to merge onto Rte. 84, and I could clearly view this object. It was a large, black triangle hovering directly above the highway. It was as long as a football field, with white flashing lights at each tip, and a glowing magenta colored circle in the middle. It did not make a sound. It was approximately 300 feet off the ground. Some cars were pulling over to view the UFO, however I drove under it. I was terrified beyond belief, and did not look back. My heart was literally pounding out of my chest. The UFO clearly was not trying to hide. I thought surely it would be on the news. There was not a single mention of the UFO on the news, on the radio, or in the newspaper. I contemplated calling the police, but figured one of the hundreds of other people witnessing this UFO had probably beat me to it.
Summary: Black triangle hovering over highway in central CT
